pkgmetadata.longdescription: pydot - Python interface to Graphviz's Dot language---------------------------------------------------Ero Carrera (c) 2004-2007ero@dkbza.orgThis code is distributed under the MIT license... image:: https://travis-ci.org/pydot/pydot-ng.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/pydot/pydot-ngRequirements:=============pyparsing: pydot requires the pyparsing module in order to beable to load DOT files.GraphViz: is needed in order to render the graphs into any ofthe plethora of output formats supported.Installation:=============Should suffice with doing: python setup.py installNeedless to say, no installation is needed just to use the module. A mere: import pydot_ngshould do it, provided that the directory containing the modules is on Pythonmodule search path.This library is API compatible with original pydot so you can use it like this: import pydot_ng as pydot
